channel.title: Kmeans on Orion Illovsky's Data Analysis Projects

item.title: Identifying Distinct Patient Groups Using K-means Clustering
item.description: Identifying Distinct Patient Groups Using K-means Clustering Description This project aimed to segment patients into distinct groups based on key healthcare metrics using K-means clustering, an unsupervised machine learning algorithm.
